data.name: Incremental Epic Hero - Global Skill Slot Pack
data.detailed_description:
The contents of this DLC are as follows:


- 1 extra Global Skill Slot
- 5500 Epic Coin
- Multiplies EXP Gain by 1.5


This DLC expands your Global Skill Slot :)
It stacks with other DLC.

Note:
- Epic Coin is a premium currency. You can purchase premium items in Epic Store with it. You can also earn Epic Coin through Daily Quest, Missions and so on in the game.
- It also increases EXP Gain from Metal Slimes.
- There are a total of 8 Global Skill Slots, and you can eventually get all of them in-game through playing the game for a long time. You can get them mainly from a Rebirth Upgrade. So after you purchase this DLC, you can spend a lot of Rebirth Points on other upgrades instead of the global skill slot upgrade. It also helps you progress early in the game.
- It applies after launching the game again.
